page.title: 15PARTRIDGE GREEN LEISURE
page.content: Partridge Green has many CLUBS and GROUPS for both sexes and all ages and INTERESTS.For the SPORTING:tennis,cricket,football and stoolball are played in season in the PARK.The MOTHERS UNION is supported by the many mothers with young children.For women in general there is the WOMENS INSTITUTE.Talks are given and beautiful pieces of handwork,embroidery and pottery,are produced.Young girls and boys may join the BROWNIES or CUBS while their older brothers and sisters have the GUIDES or SCOUTS.The VILLAGE PRODUCE ASSOCIATION is for those keen on gardening and has many members,particularly the elderly.For those wanting a meal and/or a drink there are 2 PUBLIC HOUSES.At "The Partridge" P.H.sausage,chips and a beer cost Â£1.73
